payload.prompt_preview:
You are an impartial arbiter. Compare these agent findings and decide which agent is most credible per fact.
Return ONLY JSON with keys: verdicts(list of {fact,winner,confidence,reason}), overall_confidence (0..1), should_pause_for_human (bool), human_question (str).

{"research_brief": "## Research Brief

### Primary Research Question:
What is the professional background and online presence of the entrepreneur named Abdel from Marrakech, as associated with the provided profile image?

### Key Entities:
- Abdel (Entrepreneur)
- Marrakech (Location)
- [Profile Image URL](https://a0.muscache.com/im/pictures/user/User/original/213a678f-2d3c-4b11-886e-df873b318aa4.jpeg?im_w=720)

### Scope & Constraints:
The investigation will focus on the entrepreneur named Abdel from Marrakech, as associated with the provided profile image.
